rooms.description: A welcoming foyer with traditional Chettinad design elements and decorative motifs, aligned with the entryway opening. Vastu principles emphasize south-facing entrance.

Open space that serves as both living and dining area, featuring traditional Chettinad woodwork and intricate carvings. The room is designed for social interactions with ample natural light from the south and east exposures.
Spacious master bedroom on the ground floor with attached bathroom and closet. Utilizes Vastu guidelines by positioning bed in the north-east corner for better energy flow.
Comfortable guest room with integrated storage space and adequate ventilation, aligned according to Vastu for peaceful sleeping environment.

Fully equipped kitchen designed in Chettinad style with modern amenities. The kitchen is placed in the southeast corner per Vastu principles, ensuring efficient energy circulation and easy access to dining area.
Dedicated space for additional storage and laundry, designed with adequate ventilation. It follows Vastu guidelines by being placed in a less frequently used part of the floor plan.

openings.description: Traditional Chettinad styled entry door with ornamental detailing, ensuring adherence to Vastu principle for auspicious entry.
Balcony leading to the central courtyard; designed to enhance natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy.
Multiple doorways connecting living room, bedrooms, and kitchen areas. All openings are designed with soundproofing and aesthetic considerations in line with Chettinad style.

rooms.description: Expanded master bedroom on the first floor, featuring an en-suite bathroom and a private balcony that overlooks the central courtyard. Designed with Vastu principles in mind by placing the bed in the north-east corner.
Spacious room for children, designed to be safe and airy, incorporating traditional Chettinad elements. The location is chosen per Vastu guidelines to ensure positive energy.
Dedicated study area with ample natural light from the east and north, offering a serene environment for work or reading. The room layout follows Vastu recommendations for productivity.

openings.description: Spiral staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, ensuring accessibility and safety. The placement is in the center per traditional design aesthetics.
Multiple doors leading from bedrooms to the private balconies with views of the garden and terrace. These openings are designed according to Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.

rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace providing panoramic views of the large garden and central courtyard. Designed as a relaxation zone with seating areas, garden space, and water features following Vastu guidelines for peaceful energy.

openings.description: Elevated access to the rooftop terrace from the main living area, ensuring privacy while allowing natural light. The design incorporates Chettinad styling and Vastu principles for energy flow.
